/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the busy life of the city. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their daily routines. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
